name: Greco
summary: Strategically grounded, highly experienced leader with a proven ability to establish trust and build effective cross-functional relationships. Focuses on effective communication between teams, mentoring and developing future leaders, and applying Lean and continuous improvement practices to programs and projects.

experience.title: Government Relations, Communications and Organizational Development Director
experience.company: Washington State Department of Transportation (WSDOT) – Toll Division
experience.description: Leads government relations and communications for the WSDOT Toll Division; oversees continuous improvement/Lean initiatives; represents division with media, government and industry; leads external communications team leveraging social media; distills complex information into clear visuals; facilitates policy conflict resolution workshops; manages a small team (2 managers, 8 staff).

experience.title: Director of Budget and Program Development
experience.description: Built partnerships with internal and external stakeholders; cultivated Lean initiatives; developed the organization's performance management program; trained and mentored staff; rolled out enterprise software for sales reporting; led cross-functional initiatives.

experience.title: Director of Program Management
experience.description: Led program management for the AWV program with a $3.125 billion budget; managed global teams with matrixed reporting structures; oversaw budget, finance, HR, communications, real estate services, and third-party agreements; led complex negotiations for technical agreements; directed 5 managers and 33 staff; developed policies and staffing initiatives.

experience.title: Project Director, I-90 Corridor and Sound Move Projects
experience.company: WSDOT – I-90 Corridor and Sound Move
experience.description: Directed design/construction delivery for high-capacity transit in the I-90 corridor; improved partnering and coordination between WSDOT and Sound Transit; led leadership alignment for Urban Corridors senior management including mega projects Alaskan Way Viaduct, SR 520 and I-405.

experience.title: Manager, Aviation Services and Planning
experience.description: Oversaw Pilot and Aircraft Registration Program, Aviation Planning, Outreach and Education; reorganized and relocated the Aviation Division; created the WSDOT Airport Land Use Compatibility Program; web-enabled the Aviation System Plan for 129 airports; managed consultants for pavement management; supported state aviation policy studies.

experience.title: Public Affairs Specialist
experience.description: Spokesperson to national and international media; crisis management experience including Pan Am 103; provided media training and support during interviews (e.g., 60 Minutes, 48 Hours).

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Flight Technology
